data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Plužine, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Plužine, Montenegro
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Plužine.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 7 believers in Plužine, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 2,600 citizens of Plužine, Montenegro, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Egyptian, Balkan people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, fill the 2,600 souls living in the state of Plužine with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Plužine.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 7 believers in Plužine to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.
